WorkItem.Description:
i'm currently working on an Outlook 2007 add-in (C#), to which I'm looking to add a federated search capability. 
I would like to know if it is possible ? and if so how i can retrieve searchtext (AQS) typed in by  user in the instant search box, by hooking  Outlook.ExplorerEvents_10_Event.
i'm sorry to raise a basic question, but i'm not able to find any concret example.   
Best
Jean
WorkItem.Summary: Looking on howto retrieve searchtext from outlook 2007 instantsearch
